name: Twin Movement
description: This game was developed for the Game Development Club at American High School in the 2019-2020 school year. This game was developed by Devang Bhatnagar(Junior). Twin Movement is the spiritual successor of The Mirror Image(https://d-studios.itch.io/the-mirror-image). In this game, the player moves two cylinders simultaneously across 3D world space. The cylinders must reach the end of the level without touching anything in order to progress to the next level. The player can have the cylinders look around via using the mouse, and the player can then move using WASD/arrow keys.
